Title: A short clinical history of multiple system atrophy
Abstract: © 2015, Springer-Verlag Berlin Heidelberg.In this article I shall review the history of multiple system atrophy (MSA) divided into three eras—1900 to 1969, 1969 to 1985, and 1985 to the present.
